ygData.subject: Advice needed for Monk Character
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Give up the hammers -now- friend.  It s only a shame you didn t do so sooner, but it s not too late to fix the problem with little trouble.  Soon you ll
ygData.messageBody:
>I have a 5th level monk in freeport on fennin ro. I
>decided early on to use dual hammers as weapons this
>seems to work out well my stats are ( Or close to) DW
>38 OF 27 Def 28 HTH 12 Kick 17. So here are my
>questions. One should I give up on the Hammers and
>just use my fists ( They seem to do simular damage I
>just like the Hammers) Or should I keep using the
>hammers or switch to another weapon.

Give up the hammers -now- friend. It's only a shame you didn't do so
sooner, but it's not too late to fix the problem with little trouble. Soon
you'll see, you'll never do as much damage with that weapon (or any weapon)
as you'll be able to do with your fists. It's only hurting you, in keeping
your hand to hand skill from raising.
